size.label: Size
size.description: The size of the loading indicator (Default: small)

animating.label: Spinning
animating.description: Whether to show the loading indicator (Default: true)

hidesWhenStopped.label: Hide When Stopped
hidesWhenStopped.description: Whether the indicator should hide when not animating (Default: true)

color.label: Color
color.description: The color of the loading indicator (Default: gray)
